Subject: SCP-002
Description: SCP-002 resembles a tumorous which possesses a single window not visible form the exterior in one wall of the room. It contains furniture which appears to be sculpted bone, woven hair, and various other biological substances produced by the human body.
Containment: SCP-002 is to remain connected to a suitable power supply at all times, to keep it in what appears to be a recharging mode. In case of electrical outage, the emergency barrier between the object and the facility is to be closed and the immediate area evacuated.

Subject: SCP-003
Description: It consists of two related components of SCP-003-1 and 003-2. 003-1 is composed of chitin, hair, and nails of unknown biology. 003-2 is capable of controlled emissions of radiation.
Containment: SCP-003 is to be maintained at a constant temperature of no less than 35Â°C and ideally kept above 100Â°C.Personnel who enter SCP-003's containment area must first be examined.All personnel who have come in physical contact with SCP-003-1 are to immediately report for sterilization afterwards.

Subject: SCP-004
Description: SCP-004 consists of an old wooden barn door and a set of twelve rusted steel keys. The door itself is the entrance to an abandoned factory.
Containment: When handling items SCP-004-2 through SCP-004-13,The items are not permitted to be moved off-site unless accompanied by two Level 4 security personnel.Should any of the objects contained within SCP-004-1 breach containment, or the facility be breached, the keys must be brought inside and the door closed prior to activation of Site 62â€™s on-site warhead.

Subject: SCP-005
Description: SCP-005 resembles an ornate key which seems to have the unique ability to open any and all forms of lock.
Containment: SCP-005 poses no immediate risk in any direct sense. Even so, its unique functions require special measures be taken to restrict access and manipulation of the object. Approval of at least one (1) Level 4 personnel is required for the removal of the object from its containment area.

Subject: SCP-006
Description: SCP-006 is a very small spring.The liquid emitted from it has been chemically identified as simple mineral water in 1902, but has the unusual property of health.
Containment: To deny or hide knowledge of SCP-006's effects from the personnel who interact with it ,all personnel interacting with SCP-006 in any physical way are required to wear modified Class VI BNC suits. Procedures with SCP-006 are to be carried out under extreme surveillance.Any procedure in which liquid is acquired from SCP-006 must be approved by three (3) O5 level personnel.If at any time personnel come into contact with SCP-006 or liquid from SCP-006, they are to be confined and terminated after sufficient studies are done.
